//Knapsack problem
// but change row with column
// things are in row and weight in column 
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#define mod 1000000007
#define INF 9999999
using namespace std;
int main()
{   std:ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    int n,t,i,j,e,f,W;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
    	cin>>e>>f;
    	W=f-e;
    	cin>>n;
    	vector<int> values(n+1),wt(n+1);
    	vector<vector<int> > dp(n+1,vector<int>(W+1,INF));
    	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
    		cin>>values[i]>>wt[i];
    	for(i=0;i<=n;i++)
    	    dp[i][0]=0;
    	    
    	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
    	for(j=1;j<=W;j++)
    	{
    		if(i==1 && j<wt[i])
    		dp[i][j]=INF;
    		else if(j<wt[i])
    		dp[i][j]=dp[i-1][j];
    		else
    		dp[i][j]=min(dp[i-1][j],values[i]+dp[i][j-wt[i]]);
    	}
    	if(dp[n][W]>=INF)
    	printf("This is impossible.\n");
    	else
    	printf("The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is %d.\n",dp[n][W]);
    }
	return 0;
}
